Name: InductVR (beta)
About the game: INDUCT VR is an upcoming training platform aimed at Universities and Vocational Schools. Learn carpentry, welding, 3D printing, and other specialised manufacturing tools in the safety and comfort of your virtual space. Inspired by Instructables and Autodesk's Pier 9, InductVR aims to introduce more people to tools and skills they might not have access to in the real world. ** Please note that this app contains only one demo induction and others will be available for purchase via DLC **
